Job ID:R002
Job Title:Hotel Cooking
Salary:Rs 30000/=
Description:A Cook plans, prepares, and cooks food items to ensure the highest quality service and experience for customers. They help keep the kitchen organized and running efficiently.
Customer Feedback:I found the class very fun and informative!
 I loved learning about the products we used and the products we are making! 
It made it easy to know I can do it from home.
 I really enjoyed the bread making techniques and the tips as we went along.
 It was definatly worth the money!It was wonderful to take so much away from it! I would just like to have seen the pictures on line,and I know that wasnâ€™t anyones fault. 
I give it 4 STAR OUT OF 5!
